data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Myers, Alan A., Lowry, James K., Billingham, Zac (2017): A new genus and species of freshwater Hadziidae, Fluviadulzura spinicauda gen. nov., sp. nov. from rivers in Victoria, Australia (Amphipoda). Zootaxa 4232 (1): 131-136, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.1.10|4 occurrences
